caption.p: Parainfluenza virus infection. ( a) Parainfluenza virus infection induces a lymphocytic bronchiolitis in otherwise healthy infants (H&E, 100×). ( b) In this immunocompromised infant status post bone marrow transplant, parainfluenza virus infection is associated with diffuse alveolar damage and occasional syncytial multinucleate giant cells with small cytoplasmic viral inclusions, similar to that seen in RSV infection (H&E, 200×)
